echo_item.name: <y>Echo Item</c>
echo_item.description: Give a <y>temporary item</c>. But once you <r>stop using the skill</c>, there will be a period during which the skill can't be used

void_power.name: <y>Void Power</c>
void_power.description: The more <r>empty</c> skill slots, the more <r>power</c>!
